slide.title: Querying and looping
slide.blurb: Finding multiple documents is done with the %find()%, and returns an iterator in the form of a %MongoCursor% object.
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo();
$c = $m->demo->articles;

$cursor = $c->find( [ 'title' => [ '$exists' => true ] ] );

foreach ( $cursor as $r )
{
    echo $r['title'], ': ', join( ', ', $r['tags'] ), "\n";
}
?>
